name: Tectonic Detector
uniques: Population loss from nuclear attacks [-50]% [in this city]

name: Artificial Ecoregion
uniques: [+1 Food] from [Organic] tiles [in this city] <when number of [Food] is greater than [9]>
[+1 Food] from [Organic] tiles [in this city] <when number of [Food] is greater than [19]>

civilopediaText.text: Species that humans intentionally transport to new regions can subsequently become successfully.

name: Diatom
uniques: [+1 Production] from [Fresh water] tiles [in this city]

civilopediaText.text: Diatoms appeared in Earth's Cretaceous period and have made up half of the ocean's sediments ever since. The dispersal of diatomaceous earth by westerly winds makes the desert fertile every year. Diatomaceous earth is also of industrial value.

Diatoms appeared in Earth's Cretaceous period and have made up half of the ocean's sediments ever since. The dispersal of diatomaceous earth by westerly winds makes the desert fertile every year. Diatomaceous earth is also of industrial value.
